root.data: Goal 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls5.2 Eliminate from public and private life all forms of violence against women and girls, including trafficking and sexual exploitation and other types of exploitation5.2.1 Proportion of women and girls aged 15 and over who have lived as a couple victims of physical or sexual violence during the previous 12 months2020ISTEEBUNDAYISENGA ModestDepartment of Social Studies and Statistics and Poverty Monitoring, Ponit focal ODDHead of Service and Focal Point79401937ndayimode2010@gmail.comIt is the ratio between women and girls aged 15 and over who have lived as a couple victims of physical or sexual violence during the previous 12 months and all women and girls aged 15 and over.%EDSB-III, 2016-2017Data are collected from household surveys using the "household" questionnaireThe probable date of the next collection will be 2021 (Next DHS)In 2022ISTEEBUISTEEBU is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelISTEEBU is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination of official statistics helping in planning and decision-making.The indicator is relevant because it captures the situation of violence against women.Updating the indicator requires a household survey which is very resource intensive.Women and girls aged 15 and over who have lived in a relationship who have experienced physical or sexual violence in the past 12 months divided by the total of all women and girls aged 15 and over multiplied by 100.The results of the survey are validated at two levels: technical validation and official validation before publicationThe indicator is available at national levelThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelReport of the Demographic and Health Survey 2016-2017
